entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
